tag_professor: Participation matters (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Respected (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: At first, I didn\'t know how to take her, but I ended with a real admiration of her knowledge and ability as an instructor. She\'s very involved in class discussions and provides a lot of great info. She exposed me to women\'s issues and art history for the 1st time. I went to the Met in NYC and actually had an idea of what I was looking at! Thx!

tag_professor: Participation matters (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Respected (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Has high expectations, and demands a high level of involvement in the course. She is also encouraging, helpful, clear and reasonable. She makes it feel a lot like a live classroom, and promptly provides useful responses to questions and concerns (unless off in the woods doing an art intensive). Really a very solid, inspired teacher.

tag_professor: Participation matters (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Respected (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Prof really engaged, sent personal materials from her own writings and archives, including unpublished work and hand-outs on how to run Cr groups, which were my h mire comprehensible than assigned course material. Wish there were more courses with her as she is so unique.

tag_professor: Participation matters (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Respected (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Very helpful teacher. Also very understanding, clear, and concise. She will accept late wrk if you talk to her prior to due date. Take Myth & Modern Life if you need Lit credit(s).

comments: I had the privilege to have her as a professor for Myth and Modern Life! She was a wonderful mentor and I would highly recommend her and the class. My favorite professor so far!

tag_professor: Participation matters (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Respected (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: really hard course but she kept translating instructions and kept us on bboard; was very active in discussion and did assignments with us and had offered resource suggestions to all showing interest in our projects. flexible

tag_professor: Participation matters (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Respected (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Took two courses with this prof and would take more if more were available as she raises the bar of expectations for students and helps us grow. Model prof. for online learning.I wrote and read and explored beyond assigned readings.

tag_professor: Participation matters (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Respected (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Dr. Weinbaum was wonderful, very professional, helpful and easy to understand. She made pertinent comments in discussions, workload was doable and pertinent. Thoroughly enjoyed the class, and great teacher, took suggestions for all papers. Person who gave negative comments totally off base.

tag_professor: Participation matters (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Respected (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I had Dr. Weinbaum in Mythology & Modern Life. She was highly active throughout the course and graded papers immediately with helpful feedback. Likewise, she expected students to participate early and often to the weekly discussions. She also gave students the freedom to focus on research that piqued their interest. I would highly recommend Dr. W!

tag_professor: Participation matters (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Respected (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I really enjoyed this class because the professor had a one to one mentoring relationship with me throughout the class, and waswilling to take phone calls as well as to respond to my written posts. Plus she created an opportunity to use my art....took me professionally and this was my first attempt to go back to college after raising two boys.

tag_professor: Participation matters (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Respected (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: this women\'s arthistory class was great because we started with prehistory and moved through modern media. she always kept responding with comments to what I wrote and had ideas for paper development and gave way more than most online profs here or elsewhere.

comments: Mythology and Modern Life. Best class I\'ve ever taken. Best professor I have had so far. I highly recommend this course.
